creator: Zedge
descriptionHtml:
Never be bored again. Shortz are intriguing, suspenseful pieces of chat fiction, told as a series of text messages between characters. Some are scary horror stories. Some are sexy romance stories. All of them grab your attention and make you need to know how they end.

Read them while you wait in line, or for a friend to show up. Just be prepared for strangers to wonder why you're laughing (or shrieking).

You can read the first episode of every story absolutely free to see how they grab you, then sign up for a free three-day trial to find out how they end. New episodes are added multiple times a week, and they're always as close as your phone.

Prepare to get addicted.
descriptionShort: Suspenseful interactive horror and romance chat stories.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Zedge, Inc.
22 Cortlandt Street
Floor 11
New York, New York
10007
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have launched a brand new chat fiction app so you'll never be bored again.

To help you all survive social distancing, we've increased free trial duration to 30 days and made our subscription plans more affordable. Stay home, stay safe!

New and improved app introduction process will give you a better starting experience in Shortz

Minor changes:
- Updated our colors and theme
- Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Speaking of stories… We're constantly listening to you!

And we've decided to add a twist to ours:

Now you can read as much as you'd like. No subscription needed!

Also, if you're on the go, or just don't have the time to read,
turn up the volume, Shortz Stories are now also in Audio!

Next Chapter.

title: Shortz - Chat Stories by Zedge™

container.value:
Zedge, Inc.
22 Cortlandt Street
Floor 11
New York, New York
10007

creator: Zedge
descriptionHtml:
Escape your world and join in on the story! Shortz are intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters.
It will feel as if you're right in there, with people you've never met in situations that you might have not visited, reading through someone else's conversations.

Jump into chat stories from award-winning writers and explore our originals.
Now you can read as much as you'd like. NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

Looking for a quick thrill? A bedtime story? On your lunch break or just have a minute to spare…
Take a shot of entertainment whenever and as often as you want.

Also, If you're on the go, or just don't have the time to read,
turn up the volume, Shortz's text stories are now also in Audio!

#Thrilling #Exciting #Romantic #Bite-Size #Entertainment
descriptionShort: Intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters

appDetails.developerAddress:
Zedge, Inc.
22 Cortlandt Street
Floor 11
New York, New York
10007
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We always had a lot of content to choose from.
Now, we made sure you can find it.

Thanks for using Shortz!
We hope it will give you a short break from your day and enrich it with entertainment and thrills!

Be sure to check out that next chapter, remember - no subscription necessary!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"The Paradox of Choice"..
We'll help you overcome it!
Find the best stories for you and more from your favorite writers.
Start out by choosing your age and gender and we'll take care of the rest.

Thanks for using Shortz!
We hope it will give you a short break from your day and enrich it with entertainment and thrills!
Be sure to check out that next chapter,
REMEMBER - NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

1178 Broadway
3rd Floor #1450
New York NY 10001
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're investing in bringing forward stories that are best for you!
Looking for something else? Check out search!
Or... Just simply click on one of the tags!

Thanks for using Shortz!
We hope it will give you a short break from your day and enrich it with entertainment and thrills!
Be sure to check out that next chapter,
REMEMBER - NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

title: Shortz - Chat Stories by Zedge™

container.value:
Zedge, Inc.
1178 Broadway
3rd Floor #1450
New York NY 10001

creator: Zedge
descriptionHtml:
Escape your world and join in on the story! Shortz are intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters.
It will feel as if you're right in there, with people you've never met in situations that you might have not visited, reading through someone else's conversations.

Jump into chat stories from award-winning writers and explore our originals.
Now you can read as much as you'd like. NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

Looking for a quick thrill? A bedtime story? On your lunch break or just have a minute to spare…
Take a shot of entertainment whenever and as often as you want.

Also, If you're on the go, or just don't have the time to read,
turn up the volume, Shortz's text stories are now also in Audio!

#Thrilling #Exciting #Romantic #Bite-Size #Entertainment
descriptionShort: Intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters

appDetails.developerAddress:
Zedge, Inc.
1178 Broadway
3rd Floor #1450
New York NY 10001
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
“Tap..Tap..Tap” while we believe that’s a fun experience, how about clicking a “Play” button, sitting back while controlling the speed ?!? Now you can choose.
That and more on this version of Shortz!

We hope it will give you a short break from your day and enrich it with entertainment and thrills!
Thanks for using Shortz!

Be sure to check out that next chapter,
REMEMBER - NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi again, just letting you know we're listening - Remember that paywall that bothers you when reading? We've removed it!
Hope you'll enjoy the new reading experience.
NO SUBSCRIPTION IS NECESSARY, but if you still want to remove ads - Upgrade to Premium and enjoy a whole new experience (Look for it in settings).
If you have any feedback, feel free to reach as at ContactUs@ShortzStories.com

rated.label: Mature 17+
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Violence, Blood, Sexual themes, Strong language, Crude humour
Learn more

title: Shortz - Chat Stories by Zedge

container.value:
Zedge, Inc.
1178 Broadway
3rd Floor #1450
New York NY 10001

creator: Zedge
descriptionHtml:
Escape your world and join in on the story! Shortz are intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters.
It will feel as if you're right in there, with people you've never met in situations that you might have not visited, reading through someone else's conversations.

Jump into chat stories from award-winning writers and explore our originals.
Now you can read as much as you'd like. NO SUBSCRIPTION NECESSARY!

Looking for a quick thrill? A bedtime story? On your lunch break or just have a minute to spare…
Take a shot of entertainment whenever and as often as you want.

Also, If you're on the go, or just don't have the time to read,
turn up the volume, Shortz's text stories are now also in Audio!
descriptionShort: Intriguing, suspenseful stories, told as a series of messages between characters
